title: [New API][搬运]国外免费开源小游戏之: [移动迷宫][10.5版本]
author: minecraftpe8
txt_content:
本帖最后由 minecraftpe8 于 2015-3-8 15:52 编辑 

[New API][搬运]国外免费开源小游戏之: 
                      ★[移动迷宫][10.5版本]★


(注: 小游戏插件来源于minecraftgenius76原创,免费开源)
minecraftgenius76官网: http://minecraftgenius76.com
minecraftgenius76官网免费发布了5个小游戏,分别是:
★ 移动迷宫 (Maze Runner)
★ 天空孤岛 (Sky Block)
★ 掘一死战 (Spleef)
★ 夺旗游戏 (Capture the Flag)
★ TNT跑酷 (TnTRun)
minecraftgenius76官网免费发布了几个实用插件,分别是:
★ NPC插件
★ 地图生成器插件(告别DEFAULT和FLAT,全新地图格式)
★ 传送门
...

移动迷宫描述:

Maze runner version 2.0 is an updated design mini-game for MCPE. this game is design for Maze fans -  it come with a map of many maze of different sizes and a competition mode maze. Just want to say, once you are lost inside a maze. there is no exist. don't believe. try it yourself and tell me you answer.



移动迷宫特性:

What's new in v2.00?
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. New Map with multiple types of  free-run mazes

    * Easy - safer light floor
    * Hard - Lava/Water floor

2. Multi-players Competition Maze 
     with time limit and danger path
3. Improved generation of Maze, bigger and better!


Administrator / Ops Commands for Initial Setup
================================================

"/maze build [maze id]"  - this build the maze-id specific in configuration file 

   example: /maze build pvp-maze-1 
   note: the map come with this plugin already have maze built.

"/maze destroy [maze id]"  - this remove the maze from the world

"/maze home"  - send player to game home.

================================================How to setup and Play the game?
================================================
Option #1  Easy Way - Use Map provides with this plugin. 
           Download it and put this under your server worlds
           Next, download and put the plugin file under server plugin folder.
           restart server and play

Option #2  Put maze into your existing worlds 
     make sure configuration settings are updated properly 
           Next, download and put the plugin file under server plugin folder.
           restart server and play


Once player reach the exist, tap [Nether Rector Core] block to end the game.
then teleport back to game lobby.

===============================================
Maze Game Play:
================================================
#1) Free Run Mode maze - ( 3 in the map)

 Essentially, this plugin map come with 3 free run Mazes for play and 2 PvP Maze for competitions.
 no lineup required.

#2) PvP Competition Maze (2 in the map)
 This required players go to game station, click new competition sign and enter. 
 Players will automatically enter to center of the maze.
 Click the start button to begin the game round. or Yellow to exit now.
 Timeout in 8000 ticks on each game run. 


Requirement:
Latest Pocketmine server

Installation: 
Just drop .phar into PocketMine Server plugin folder 
Restart server

Bug Report:

replies.author: gjx124
replies.txt_content:
移动迷宫特性:
在v2.00有什么新鲜事吗?
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
1。新地图与多种类型的空运转迷宫
*容易-安全光地板上
* -熔岩/水楼
2。多人竞争迷宫
随着时间的限制和危险的道路
3。改进一代的迷宫,更大更好!
初始设置的管理员/行动命令
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =
“迷宫id /迷宫构建”——这个构建maze-id特定的配置文件
例如:构建pvp-maze-1 /迷宫
注:地图上有这个插件已经迷宫。
“迷宫id /迷宫摧毁”——这个删除的迷宫世界
“/迷宫家”——把玩家游戏送回家。
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =如何设置和玩游戏?
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =
选择# 1的简单方法——利用图与这个插件提供。
下载它,把这世界在你的服务器
接下来,下载并将插件文件在服务器的插件文件夹。
重新启动服务器和玩耍
选项# 2把迷宫到您现有的世界
确保正确配置设置更新
接下来,下载并将插件文件在服务器的插件文件夹。
重新启动服务器和玩耍
一旦玩家达到的存在,利用[虚空校长核心)块结束游戏。
然后传送回游戏大厅。
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =
迷宫游戏:
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =
# 1)自由运行模式迷宫——(3的地图)
从本质上讲,这个插件地图有3自由运行迷宫游戏和2 PvP迷宫比赛。
不需要阵容。
# 2)PvP竞争迷宫地图(2)
这需要玩家去游戏站,点击并输入新的竞争标志。
玩家将自动进入迷宫的中心。
点击开始按钮开始游戏。现在退出或黄色。
在每个游戏运行超时8000年蜱虫。
要求:
最新Pocketmine服务器
安装:
就下降。phar到PocketMine服务器插件文件夹中
重新启动服务器
错误报告:
